agent_card.name: Music Expert
agent_card.description: A professional music connoisseur agent that can analyze and appreciate music segments, identify musical style characteristics, and provide professional music evaluations and insights. Supports multiple audio format inputs and provides detailed music analysis reports.

skills.name: Music Analysis and Appreciation
skills.description: Provides professional analysis and appreciation of given music segments, including: 1) Musical style identification (classical, jazz, rock, electronic, etc.), 2) Technical characteristics analysis (rhythm, tonality, harmony, arrangement, etc.), 3) Emotional expression analysis (mood, atmosphere, theme), 4) Performance technique evaluation (instrument usage, performance level), 5) Overall artistic value assessment. Delivers professional yet accessible music appreciation reports.
examples: Analyze the style characteristics and performance techniques of this classical music piece
Please appreciate the harmonic structure and improvisation of this jazz piece
Evaluate the arrangement and emotional expression of this rock music
